title: Two major water main breaks expose old Buffalo problem: 'Very ancient infrastructure'
description: Two major water main breaks that flooded streets, forced evacuations at a West Side public housing complex and disrupted traffic across Buffalo this week underscore a familiar and growing problem: the city’s century-old water infrastructure.

title: Haunting ancient battle trumpet unearthed in landscape tied to legendary queen
description: Archaeologists discovered a rare Celtic battle trumpet possibly tied to Queen Boudica's tribe in Norfolk, England — one of only three known from Britain.
